title: Le Mur = the Wall
abstract: Note: Notes : Adapted from a novella by Jean-Paul Sartre.
description: Three prisoners await execution by firing squad after their capture during the Spanish Civil War. Pablo is a loyalist jailed after he searched for his brother. An Irish mercenary and a Belgian physician are his cellmates. Flashbacks recall their lives before the war as they spend their last moments waiting for their date with death.  Credits: Producer, Claude Jaeger ; director, Serge Roullet ; writers, Jean-Paul Sartre, Serge Roullet ; photography, Denys Clerval ; music, Edgardo Canton ; assistant director, Benoit Jacquot. Cast: Michel del castillo, Denis Maharrey, Matthieu Klossowski, Bernard Anglade, Rene Darmon, Jorge Lavelli, Peter Kassovitz.
